long_description: Built to get muddy on cyclocross courses or speed through daily commutes, the versatile Cannondale CAADX Disc Tiagra bike pairs the all-weather stopping power of disc brakes with solid Tiagra parts. ProMax Render R disc brakes offer powerful braking even in the water, mud and slop of a typical 'cross course. Shimano Tiagra shifters and derailleurs reliably move through the 20 gear combinations. Sturdy 6061 aluminum frame seats you in an upright position for stable handling and a comfortable ride. Rear stays are shaped to help make bumps and vibrations less jarring for improved tracking. BB30 bottom bracket shell design increases stiffness for improved power transfer. Ultra X fork with carbon blades helps reduce weight and road vibration, enhancing the ride quality. Geared for easy-spinning versatility, the FSA Omega 46/36 crankset is paired with a 12-28 cassette to give you a "just right" gear for tough gradients and boggy mud. Schwalbe Sammy Slick tires feature fast-rolling center tread with ample grip and puncture resistance to handle dirt and gravel. Frame eyelets make it easy to attach fenders or a rear rack for enhanced utility (not included); pedals not included. Cannondale CAADX Tiagra bike specs are subject to change.
